001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003/**
004 * Factory interface for class that aims to create IPokedex instance.
005 * 
006 * @author fv
007 */
008public interface IPokedexFactory {
009
010        /**
011         * Creates a new pokedex instance using the given 
012         * {@code metadataProvider} and {@code pokemonFactory}.
013         * 
014         * @param metadataProvider Metadata provider the created pokedex will use.
015         * @param pokemonFactory Pokemon factory the created pokedex will use.
016         * @return Created pokedex instance.
017         */
018        IPokedex createPokedex(IPokemonMetadataProvider metadataProvider, IPokemonFactory pokemonFactory);
019        
020}
